Just because you're having a bad day doesn't mean you're having a bad life.
Swimming - what real men do while boys play football.
A bad day is just a day where you have been thinking more negative thoughts than positive ones.
You'll look a lot less crazy if you can get your friend to do it with you.
You don't have to be crazy to be my friend but it sure helps!
Being someone's first love may be great, but to be their last is beyond perfect.
Some are bound to die young,By dying young a person stays young in people's memory.If he burns brightly before he dies, his brightness shines for all time

Being classy is a culmination of being yourself, being positive, and doing good in all the places you can by all the means you can. Clothes, hair, music, film....none of these things a classy person make.
I don't need to "get a life". I'm a gamer. I have lots of lives.
Every relationship has its own problems. But sometimes what makes it perfect is if you still wanna be together, when things go the wrong way.
Don't forget that maybe you are the lighthouse in someone's storm.
You know the first moment you look at him or her and you felt that feeling that you've never felt before then you know you have fallen in love with just one look.
Sometimes good people make bad choices. It doesn't mean they are bad people, it means they're human.
Sometimes you need those bad days, to help you appreciate the good ones.
When you feel dog tired at night, it may be because you've growled all day long.
Night is the blotting paper for many sorrows.
Relationships are stronger when you're best friends first, and a couple second.
Life's short, don't waste it being sad. Be who you are, be happy, be free. Be whatever you want to be.
The secret of being happy is accepting where you are in life and making the most out of everyday.
If you have crazy friends, you have everything.
Staying together when things get tough will only make you a stronger couple.
Chances are like lightning: they never hit the earth at the same spot twice. So when a chance comes your way, grab it cause it may never come again.
Night is longer than day for those who dream and day is longer than night for those who make their dreams come true. Good Night and Sweet Dreams.

Too many people confine their exercise to jumping to conclusions, running up bills, stretching the truth, bending over backwards, lying down on the job, sidestepping responsibility and pushing their luck.
The devil when he purports any evil against man, first perverts his mind.
Memories are good, as long as we keep them in the rearview mirror and keep moving.
Nothing wrong with apologizing, but saying I'm sorry does nothing when you continue to make the same mistakes.
It's easier to apologize than ask for permission.
Wait for the one you love? not the one who found you first.
Apologizing does not always mean that you are wrong and the other person is right. It just means that you value your relationship more than your ego.
Don't let fear of the unknown stop you from experiencing the truly fulfilling moments that life has to offer you.
Don't lift until the fear of death over comes the fear of speed.
It's a good idea to begin at the bottom in everything except in learning to swim.
Physical strength is measured by what we carry. Inner strength is measured by what we can bear
Any good apology has 3 parts: 1)I'm sorry 2)It's my fault 3)What can I do to make it right? Most people forget the third part.

I fall in love with you just thinking about you, remembering all the memories we've made... falling in love for the first time, our first kiss, saying our first I love you's, finding more to love about each other every day. And whenever I think about all
Speed costs, how fast do you want to go?
Being classy isn't a choice. Its a lifestyle.
Little boys are like snowflakes, there are no two alike.
Even the best of friends face conflicts, but that needn't mean the end of the relationship.
The best person to talk to about the problems in your relationship is the person you're in a relationship with.
The only way I can get through Wednesday is by avoiding people who call it Hump Day.
If you want to thank a soldier, be the kind of American worth fighting for.
Govern thyself then you will be able to govern the world.

author: ursula-k.-le-guin
quotes: We read books to find out who we are. What other people, real or imaginary, do and think and feel is an essential guide to our understanding of what we ourselves are and may become.
The only thing that makes life possible is permanent, intolerable uncertainty; not knowing what comes next.
Only in silence the word, only in dark the light, only in dying life: bright the hawk's flight on the empty sky.

Grieving, like being blind, is a strange business; you have to learn how to do it. We seek company in mourning, but after the early bursts of tears, after the praises have been spoken, and the good days remembered, and the lament cried, and the grave closed, there is no company in grief. It is a burden borne alone.
It is good to have an end to journey towards; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
Love doesn't just sit there like a stone; it has to be made,like bread, remade all the time, made new.
Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone, it has to be made, like bread; remade all the time, made new.
AÂ machineÂ is more blameless, more sinless even than any animal. It has no intentions whatsoever but our own.
A forest ecology is a delicate one. If the forest perishes, its fauna may go with it. The Athshean word for world is also the word for forest.
What sane person could live in this world and not be crazy?

Reality was empty: without life or warmth or color or sound: without meaning. There were no heights or depths. All this lovely play of form and light and color on the sea and in the eyes of men, was no more than that: a playing of illusions on the shallow void.
Belief is the wound that knowledge heals.
But you must not change one thing, one pebble, one grain of sand, until you know what good and evil will follow on that act.
You always have to defend the imagination against idiots.
A realist is a man who knows both the world and his own dreams.
Scientific truth will out, you can't hide the sun under a stone.
Primitiveness and civilization are degrees of the same thing. If civilization has an opposite, it is war.
When you light a candle, you also cast a shadow
Truth is a matter of the imagination.

The misogyny that shapes every aspect of our civilization is the institutionalized form of male fear and hatred of what they have denied and therefore cannot know, cannot share: that wild country, the being of women.
There’s an ideal beauty that is harder to define or understand, because it occurs not just in the body but where the body and the spirit meet and define each other.
The literature of the emperor penguin is as forbidding, as inaccessible, as the frozen heart of Antarctica itself. Its beauties may be unearthly, but they are not for us.
Love doesn't just sit there, like a stone; it has to be made, like bread, remade all the time, made new.
The children of the revolution are always ungrateful, and the revolution must be grateful that it is so.
To light a candle is to cast a shadow.
What the brain does by itself is infinitely more fascinating and complex than any response it can make to chemical stimulation.
Children know perfectly well that unicorns aren’t real, but they also know that books about unicorns, if they are good books, are true books.

It is our suffering that brings us together. It is not love. Love does not obey the mind, and turns to hate when forced. The bond that binds us is beyond choice. We are brothers. We are brothers in what we share. In pain, which each of us must suffer alone, in hunger, in poverty, in hope, we know our brotherhood.
The great authors share their souls with us â€” literally.
One voice speaking truth is a greater force than fleets and armies.
TheÂ machineÂ conceals the machinations.
If civilization has an opposite, it is war. Of these two things, you have either one, or the other. Not both.
It is good to have an end to journey toward, but it is the journey that matters in the end.

Now perhaps an excessive dread of overpopulation overcrowding reflects not an outward reality, but an inward state of mind. If you feel overcrowded when you're not, what does that mean? Maybe that you're afraid of human contact of being close to people, of being touched.
My imagination makes me human and makes me a fool; it gives me all the world and exiles me from it.
Truth, as ever, avoids the stranger.
Between thought and spoken word is a gap where intention can enter, the symbol be twisted aside, and the lie come to be.
You cannot blame everything on the enemy.
If science fiction is the mythology of modern technology, then its myth is tragic.
It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
When you light a candle, you also cast a shadow.

In the tale, in the telling, we are all one blood. Take the tale in your teeth, then, and bite till the blood runs, hoping it's not poison; and we will all come to the end together, and even to the beginning: living, as we do, in the middle.
A forest ecology is a delicate one. If the forest perishes, its fauna may go with it. The athshean word for world is also the word for forest.
